title: What is an easy and valuable online personal nutrition course? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should enrol to ACE ( American council on exercise) which offers course in nutrition. ACE is internationally recognised institution and their courses are widely acceptable in health and fitness industry worldwide. You can enrol directly through their website ace fitness.org or with http://bfyfitness.com or through Building careers in the fitness industry - Classic Fitness Academy

Most well known nutrition courses are pretty much the same. It's a science. Doesn't change from institute to institute. However, you should check if the certificate you will receive is valid internationally because that gives you an edge if you are thinking of employment as a nutritionist.
